pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, chemical-resistant gloves, shoes plus socks and protective eyewear

Safety_Information.general_Info: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing the eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: If ingested, induce emesis or lavage stomach. Treat symptomatically.

Application_Info.units: fl. oz per 100 gals of water
Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 5.4 gallons per acre per crop per calendar year
Application_Info.application_Method: Full coverage spray to the point of drip
